Text:
...Heh, where's the "Sketch Variant" cover, where all the artists at this year's SDCC will be lining up to do quick sketches of Bert and Ernie in bed with each other, doing all sorts of odd acts of foreplay and sex?

"Mr. Liefeld? Can you do a dirty sketch with Ernie and Bert?"

"Sure kid, whaddya wanna see them doing to one another?"

"I want Ernie performing Hindu Foot Worship and Toenail Painting on Bert!"

"..."
ChingaTuu, you know you want frank cho to draw you a very special elmo & katy perry cover! or better yet, elmo & that guy who did elmo's voice -- who was also "jerry sandusky-ing" some people.
